title: 5 Ways Tech Companies Can Improve Their Sustainability - Entrepreneur
summary: Technology companies are increasingly adopting sustainable practices to reduce their environmental impact and meet growing consumer demand for eco-friendly products and services. Green initiatives include embracing the circular economy, investing in eco-friendly products and manufacturing, encouraging recycling, extending the lifecycle of devices, and fostering a culture of sustainability.

title: Is the Skincare Industry Recession Proof? - Happi
summary: Inflation is affecting all sectors of the market, and consumers are noticing the prices at the register. Despite this, the skincare industry is experiencing a rebound in sales, with consumers prioritizing skincare routines and returning to more social routines and events out of the home. Skincare shoppers are more concerned about quality than price and are willing to pay more for sustainable products.

title: Autel Energy Holds Partner Summit in Amsterdam - AftermarketNews.com (AMN)

title: MT Interview: Stuart Mustoe, CEO TrustFord - Motor Trader
summary: TrustFord, a large UK automotive dealership group, is expanding its presence in northern England and Scotland with three new dealerships opening over the next 12 months. The company has also been recognized for its green initiatives, including installing LED lighting and solar panels at its dealerships, and is aiming to become carbon neutral by 2035. TrustFord is embracing Ford's transition to electric vehicles and plans to have all of its sales be 100% electric by 2035.
